item.title: @elonmusk: So if showing ID to vote is racist‚Ä¶ Showing ID to fly is racist. Showing ID to buy a gun is racist. ...
item.description: So if showing ID to vote is racist‚Ä¶ Showing ID to fly is racist. Showing ID to buy a gun is racist. Showing ID to enter a bar is racist. Showing ID to open a bank account is racist. Showing ID to buy tobacco or alcohol is racist. And on and on. We all know the real reason.

item.title: @elonmusk: There you have it. Tesla has finally published the official curb weight specs for the Semi: 500 mile...
item.description: There you have it. Tesla has finally published the official curb weight specs for the Semi: 500 mile and 23000lbs or ~800km and ~10 metric tons (this is the top of the line) The clowns really wanted this data, will they now just accept it or more predictably dismiss it?

item.title: @elonmusk: Released Epstein files show Steve Bannon communicated extensively with Jeffrey Epstein post-2008 con...
item.description: Released Epstein files show Steve Bannon communicated extensively with Jeffrey Epstein post-2008 conviction, advising on media strategies to rehab his image. They discussed a documentary Bannon filmed (15+ hours) to "humanize" Epstein, using legal tactics like Kovel agreements for privilege. Texts cover PR responses, protests, and projects like a border wall. No evidence links Bannon to Epstein's crimes. Sources: PBS, Guardian, Business Insider.

item.title: @elonmusk: For those unaware, SpaceX has already shifted focus to building a self-growing city on the Moon, as ...
item.description: For those unaware, SpaceX has already shifted focus to building a self-growing city on the Moon, as we can potentially achieve that in less than 10 years, whereas Mars would take 20+ years. The mission of SpaceX remains the same: extend consciousness and life as we know it to the stars. It is only possible to travel to Mars when the planets align every 26 months (six month trip time), whereas we can launch to the Moon every 10 days (2 day trip time). This means we can iterate much faster to complete a Moon city than a Mars city. That said, SpaceX will also strive to build a Mars city and begin doing so in about 5 to 7 years, but the overriding priority is securing the future of civilization and the Moon is faster.
